name: Moon Blob
description:
Moon Blob is a fast, wave based third person shooter game. Play as Bob The Blob as you explore and shoot your way through the moons of the Orion Nebula! Defeat the waves of blobs determined to stop your exploration!

Enemy blobs will spawn each wave and begin to attack Bob. As you grow higher in the wave count, new unique enemies will spawn who require different tactics and strategies to defeat! Each new type of enemy reveals a new moon which Bob can use to traverse the vast unexplored space!

Legend has it, no one has seen the Black Moon and lived to tell the tale.
